Identical Elements

Elements inside and outside drawer are exactly the same, while they have slightly different styles.

Drawer is fully compatible with lists. View more on Lists

Control via Javascript

<button onclick="document.querySelector('body').classList.remove('with-drawer')">Hide Drawer</button> <button onclick="document.querySelector('body').classList.add('with-drawer')">Show Drawer</button>

<button onclick="document.querySelector('body').classList.add('with-drawer', 'drawer-collapsed')">Collapse</button> <button onclick="document.querySelector('body').classList.add('with-drawer') & document.querySelector('body').classList.remove('drawer-collapsed')">Show Drawer</button>
